Goblin raiders were found during the 2013 Goblin Invasion event. The level 4 variant first appeared in the Varrock raids on 10 May 2013, and would spawn near the east, west, or south entrance to Varrock. When the Goblin Invasion event officially started on 2 August 2013, the level 30 variant was introduced and had improved drops. Starting from the following raids in Lumbridge, the level 50 variant was introduced.

While fighting, the goblin raiders would shout phrases above their heads. Example phrases include:

  • For Snagwort!
  • Humans ugly!
  • Fear the Sun Cult!
  • You die, human!

'''Goblin raiders''' were found during the [[2013 Goblin Invasion]] event. The level 4 variant first appeared in the [[Varrock]] raids on 10 May 2013, and would spawn near the east, west, or south entrance to Varrock. When the Goblin Invasion event officially started on 2 August 2013, the level 30 variant was introduced and had improved drops. Starting from the following raids in [[Lumbridge]], the level 50 variant was introduced.

While fighting, the goblin raiders would shout phrases above their heads. Example phrases include:
*For Snagwort!
*Humans ugly!
*Fear the Sun Cult!
*You die, human!
